tag_list: ecommerce, smb, small-businesses, procurement, purchasing, commerce-network, social-marketing
overview: David is the co-founder of Buyful, an innovative B2B marketplace for small businesses. He is a veteran entrepreneur who brings to Buyful years of experience and passion for building and growing technology companies. Previously, he led the creation of innovative software, web services and online solutions for consumer and SMBs. David was the founder and CEO of number of business-decisions software companies that served tens of thousands of managers in small companies as well as global corporations.
